<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="800" height="600" style="background-color:#F0F0F0">

<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect width="100%" height="100%" fill="#F0F0F0"/>

    <!-- Header -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="800" height="70" fill="#007BFF"/>
    <text x="20" y="45" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="white">空き枠一覧</text>

    <!-- Date Selection Area -->
    <rect x="40" y="90" width="720" height="70" fill="white" stroke="#CCCCCC" rx="10"/>
    <text x="60" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">日付選択:</text>
    <rect x="200" y="100" width="200" height="50" fill="#F8F9FA" stroke="#6C757D" rx="5"/>
    <text x="210" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">2023-12-25</text>

    <!-- Time Slots List -->
    <rect x="40" y="180" width="720" height="350" fill="white" stroke="#CCCCCC" rx="10"/>

    <!-- Individual Slot Template -->
    <rect x="60" y="200" width="680" height="70" fill="#E9ECEF" stroke="#ADB5BD" rx="8"/>
    <text x="80" y="230" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">10:00 - 11:30</text>
    <text x="300" y="230" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">残り席数: 3/10</text>
    <rect x="650" y="210" width="80" height="40" fill="#28A745" rx="5"/>
    <text x="665" y="235" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">予約</text>

    <!-- Additional Slot Rows -->
    <rect x="60" y="280" width="680" height="70" fill="#E9ECEF" stroke="#ADB5BD" rx="8"/>
    <text x="80" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">13:00 - 14:30</text>
    <text x="300" y="310" font-family="Arial" font-size="16">残り席数: 5/10</text>
    <rect x="650" y="290" width="80" height="40" fill="#28A745" rx="5"/>
    <text x="665" y="315" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">予約</text>

    <!-- Sold Out Slot -->
    <rect x="60" y="360" width="680" height="70" fill="#DC3545" stroke="#ADB5BD" rx="8"/>
    <text x="80" y="390" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="white">15:00 - 16:30</text>
    <text x="300" y="390" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="white">売切</text>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <rect x="0" y="550" width="800" height="50" fill="#6C757D"/>
    <text x="350" y="580" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">© 2023 予約システム</text>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="800" height="600" style="background-color:#F0F0F0">
  <rect x="50" y="30" width="700" height="540" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#FFFFFF" stroke="#E0E0E0" stroke-width="1"/>
  
  <!-- Header -->
  <rect x="50" y="30" width="700" height="70" fill="#007BFF" rx="10" ry="10" />
  <text x="100" y="75" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="#FFFFFF">予約枠詳細</text>

  <!-- Time Slot Details -->
  <text x="100" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333333" font-weight="bold">日時：</text>
  <text x="250" y="130" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#333333">2024年3月15日 14:00 - 15:30</text>

  <!-- Reservation Button -->
  <rect x="250" y="400" width="300" height="50" rx="10" ry="10" fill="#007BFF" />
  <text x="360" y="430" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#FFFFFF">予約する</text>

  <!-- Status Indicator -->
  <circle cx="700" y="170" r="10" fill="#28A745"/>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="800" height="600" viewBox="0 0 800 600">
    <!-- Background -->
    <rect width="800" height="600" fill="#F0F0F0"/>
    
    <!-- Header -->
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="800" height="60" fill="#007BFF"/>
    <text x="20" y="40" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" fill="white">予約詳細</text>
    
    <!-- Main Content Container -->
    <rect x="40" y="80" width="720" height="480" fill="white" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#E0E0E0" stroke-width="2"/>
    
    <!-- Reservation Basics -->
    <text x="60" y="120" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">予約情報</text>
    
    <!-- Icons and Details -->
    <g fill="#333333" font-family="Arial">
        <text x="80" y="160" font-size="14">予約ID:</text>
        <text x="220" y="160" font-size="14">[reservation_id]</text>
        
        <text x="80" y="190" font-size="14">予約日:</text>
        <text x="220" y="190" font-size="14">[reservation_date]</text>
        
        <text x="80" y="220" font-size="14">予約時間:</text>
        <text x="220" y="220" font-size="14">[start_time] - [end_time]</text>
        
        <text x="80" y="250" font-size="14">人数:</text>
        <text x="220" y="250" font-size="14">[number_of_people]人</text>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Customer Section -->
    <text x="60" y="290" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">顧客情報</text>
    
    <g fill="#333333" font-family="Arial">
        <text x="80" y="330" font-size="14">顧客名:</text>
        <text x="220" y="330" font-size="14">[customer_name]</text>
        
        <text x="80" y="360" font-size="14">メール:</text>
        <text x="220" y="360" font-size="14">[email]</text>
        
        <text x="80" y="390" font-size="14">電話番号:</text>
        <text x="220" y="390" font-size="14">[phone_number]</text>
    </g>
    
    <!-- Options Section -->
    <text x="60" y="430" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">追加オプション</text>
    
    <text x="80" y="470" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333333">[options]</text>
    
    <!-- Action Buttons -->
    <rect x="500" y="510" width="120" height="40" fill="#28A745" rx="5" ry="5"/>
    <text x="530" y="535" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">編集</text>
    
    <rect x="630" y="510" width="120" height="40" fill="#DC3545" rx="5" ry="5"/>
    <text x="660" y="535" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">キャンセル</text>
</svg>

<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="800" height="600" style="background-color:#F5F5F5">
